original_title: Hurricane Erin’s path poses a serious threat to North Carolina’s Outer Banks and dangerous surf up the East Coast | CNN
article_summary: Hurricane Erin intensifies to a Category 2, causing dangerous coastal conditions along the US East Coast, particularly in North Carolina's Outer Banks. Preparations are underway as the hurricane tracks north, with a state of emergency declared in North Carolina. Officials urge evacuation due to potential flooding and impassable roads.</s>
